original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pabbatassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena pabbatassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti
yathā mahā rāja pabbataḥ acalaḥ a kampitaḥ a sampavedhī

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sammānane vimānane sakkāre asakkāre garukāre
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sammānane vimānane sakkāre asakkāre garukāre

original: agarukāre yase ayase nindāya pasaṁsāya sukhe dukkhe iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sabbattha rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu
analyzed: agarukāre yase ayase nindāya pasasāya sukhe dukkhe iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu sabbattha rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba dhammesu

original: rajanīyesu na rajjitabbaṁ, dussanīyesu na dussitabbaṁ, muyhanīyesu na muyhitabbaṁ,
analyzed: rajanīyesu na rajjitabba dussanīyesu na dussitabba muyhanīyesu na muyhitabba

original: na kampitabbaṁ na calitabbaṁ, pabbatena viya acalena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: na kampitabba na calitabba pabbatena viya acalena bhavitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pabbatassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja pabbatassa paṭhamam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pabbato thaddho na kenaci saṁsaṭṭho;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja pabbataḥ thaddhaḥ na kenacid sa saṭṭhaḥ

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena thaddhena asaṁsaṭṭhena bhavitabbaṁ, na kenaci saṁsaggo karaṇīyo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena thaddhena a sasaṭṭhena bhavitabba na kenacid sa saggaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pabbatassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja pabbatassa dutiyam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pabbate bījaṁ na virūhati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja pabbate bījam na virūhati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sakamānase kilesā na virūhāpetabbā.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena saka mānase kilesāḥ na virūhāpetabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pabbatassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja pabbatassa tatiyam aṅgam gahetabba
puna capara mahā rāja pabbataḥ accuggataḥ

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇaccuggatena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇa cuggatena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pabbatassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja pabbatassa catuttham aṅgam gahetabba

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pabbato anunnato anonato;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja pabbataḥ an unnataḥ an onataḥ

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena unnatāvanati na karaṇīyā.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena unnati avanati na karaṇīyā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pabbatassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja pabbatassa pañcamam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, upāsikāya cūḷasubhaddāya sakasamaṇe parikittayamānāya—
analyzed: mahā rāja upāsikāya cūḷasubhaddāya saka samaṇe parikittayamānāya
